Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel near Dubai Airport”
Reviews.Author: Jo-Bob_Bob-Bob
Reviews.Content: spent 6 days dubai hotel enitre stay moving avenue hotel al rigga st hotel average size bathroom looks dated tub plastic shower head vertical rod supposed tighten broken shower head stuck bottom rod makes uncomfortable angle shower toilet seat plastic cool dubai day checked hotel heat sitting cold feet wearing jacket called desk service heat bed hard feel springs balcony locked accesible noise street comes straight door balcony wind booked hotel third party paid nights checked afghanistan sit freezing dubai recomend hotel unless else available

Reviews.Title: “Quiet place and pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: asterisk1964
Reviews.Content: avenue hotel located rigga road close clock minutes deira city center mall facing metro station hotel 4 star city hotel guests rank 3 lobby smallbut reception nice stay dbl king bed okbut single bed management dwarfs dinning opposite lobby food acceptable besides steak house mezzanine floor 49ers night club live band bar hotel passable rates

Reviews.Title: “Very unhelpful reception staff”
Reviews.Author: aliport
Reviews.Content: comfortable clean food terrible cold staff reception rude unhelpful change money clerk insisted uk sterling euros tried rate euros sterling wrong refused change money told outside bars dark disco pick joints hotel seedy jewellery stall reception poor salesman kept pestering buy answer literally followed lift time walked hotel recommend staying unless business trip require clean bed night eating elsewhere

HotelInfo.Name: Manhattan Avenue Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Al Rigga Street | P.O. Box: 182244, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
